org.dotplot.eclipse.actions
Class PlotAction

java.lang.Object
  org.dotplot.eclipse.actions.PlotAction
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.EventListener, GridCallback, org.eclipse.swt.events.SelectionListener, org.eclipse.swt.internal.SWTEventListener, org.eclipse.ui.IActionDelegate, org.eclipse.ui.IWorkbenchWindowActionDelegate
Direct Known Subclasses:
PlotJobAction
public class PlotAction
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.eclipse.ui.IWorkbenchWindowActionDelegate, org.eclipse.swt.events.SelectionListener, GridCallback

PlotAction creates a DotPlot from all checked files in the navigator.

Author:
Sascha Hemminger & Roland Helmrich
See Also:
IWorkbenchWindowActionDelegate
